name: Cosmic Affairs
description:
A management game made for GMTK 2020 Game Jam.

Take command of a space crew in pursuit of profit and... well, profit. Manage your crew well, or risk them getting out of control.

Game By: Will Bertiz, Timothy Hartt, Matthew Sissom, Kipling Tidwell

Art by: Timothy Hartt

Music by: Will Bertiz

OST: https://soundcloud.com/docmrsir
